title: Primary colors
creator_credit: Mike Nichols, Mutual Film Company and Universal Pictures
brief_description: Jack Stanton is a governor from a small southern state who, while sincere in his devotion to the American people, is nevertheless plagued by scandal at every twist on the campaign trail to the presidency. Includes music score by Ry Cooder. Cast includes John Travolta, Emma Thompson, Billy Bob Thornton, Kathy Bates, Adrian Lester, Larry Hagman and Diane Ladd.
